docs.snippet: The state has reduced its prison population on orders of the United States Supreme Court, but not yet by the required number....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state has reduced its prison population on orders of the United States Supreme Court, but not yet by the required number.
docs.abstract: California continues to reduce its prison population on orders of United States Supreme Court, but is far from reaching required reduction of 30,000 prisoners, as the court mandated; Gov Jerry Brown declares that state's prison emergency has subsided, arguing that federal courts should relinquish control of state system.

headline.seo: California Grapples With Courts on Prison Overcrowding
headline.main: California Sheds Prisoners but Grapples With Courts
headline.print_headline: California Sheds Prisoners but Grapples With Courts

docs.snippet: It's that time of year again in Davos, Switzerland, as the World Economic Forum gets under way. | Aerospace is the latest frontier for the Chinese government's investment of its foreign reserves. | Many in the private equity sector acknowledge tha...
docs.abstract: It's that time of year again in Davos, Switzerland, as the World Economic Forum gets under way. | Aerospace is the latest frontier for the Chinese government's investment of its foreign reserves. | Many in the private equity sector acknowledge that tax rules are likely to change. | Mary Jo White, a former United States attorney, may be tapped to lead the S.E.C.

docs.snippet: The recovery effort following Hurricane Sandy has been uneven, and there is ample evidence that many people are still struggling in the aftermath of one of the most vicious storms to hit the region....
docs.lead_paragraph: The recovery effort following Hurricane Sandy has been uneven, and there is ample evidence that many people are still struggling in the aftermath of one of the most vicious storms to hit the region.
docs.abstract: Grueling recovery effort following Hurricane Sandy's destruction in New York and New Jersey continues as area residents work to repair, rebuild and reopen shattered homes and businesses;  profiles of how some people and places are faring on the road back highlighted.

headline.seo: Recovery Remains Spotty 3 Months After Hurricane Sandy
headline.main: Recovery Remains Spotty 3 Months After Hurricane
headline.print_headline: Recovery Remains Spotty 3 Months After Hurricane
